daytime.description: Indicates whether the game is currently in daytime phase.

barracksKills.description: Number of barracks the team members destroyed during the game.

bestKillStreak.description: The highest kill streak value achieved among the team members during the game so far.

creepKillGold.description: Total amount of gold the team members earned for killing creeps.

faction.description: The team faction, e.g. RADIANT, DIRE.

heroKillGold.description: Total amount of gold the team members earned for killing heroes.

heroKills.description: Number of heroes the team members killed during the game.

killStreak.description: The highest current kill streak value among the team members.

mapWins.description: Number of times the team won the game in current match series.

cooldownUntil.description: Number of seconds remaining until the ability cooldown.

lastUsedAt.description: The ingame clock's time in milliseconds of when the ability was last used.

agility.description: The player's hero current agility value.

alive.description: Indicates whether the player's hero is currently alive.

assists.description: Number of assists the player performed during the game.

bestKillStreak.description: The player's best kill streak during the game.

buybackCooldown.description: Absolute Game time when buyback is next available.

buybackCost.description: Current buyback cost of the player's hero.

creepKillGold.description: Total amount of gold the player earned for killing creeps.

deaths.description: Number of times the player died during the game.

denies.description: Number of denies the player performed during the game.

goldEarned.description: Total amount of gold the player had earned during the game.

healingDone.description: Total number of times the player healed.

health.description: The player's hero current health value.

healthMax.description: The player's hero max health value.

healthRegen.description: The player's hero health regen rate.

heroKillGold.description: Total amount of gold the player earned for killing heroes.

intelligence.description: The player's hero current intelligence value.

cooldownUntil.description: Number of seconds remaining until the item cooldown.

itemNeutral.title: ItemState
itemNeutral.description: Information about neutral item the player has currently equipped.

itemsBackpack.description: List of items the player currently has in their backpack.

cooldownUntil.description: Number of seconds remaining until the item cooldown.

items.title: ItemState
items.description: List of items the player currently has in their backpack.

cooldownUntil.description: Number of seconds remaining until the item cooldown.

itemsInventory.description: List of items the player currently has in their inventory.

cooldownUntil.description: Number of seconds remaining until the item cooldown.

items.title: ItemState
items.description: List of items the player currently has in their inventory.

itemsStash.description: List of items the player currently has in their stash.

cooldownUntil.description: Number of seconds remaining until the item cooldown.

items.title: ItemState
items.description: List of items the player currently has in their stash.

kills.description: Number of enemy hero kills the player performed during the game.

lastHitStreak.description: The player's current last hit streak.

lastHits.description: Number of last hits the player performed during the game.

magicResist.description: The player's hero current magic resist value.

mana.description: The player's hero current mana value.

manaMax.description: The player's hero max mana value.

manaRegen.description: The player's hero mana regen rate.

movementSpeed.description: The player's hero current movement speed value.

networth.description: Sum of the player's current gold balance and prices of owned items.

position.title: Position
position.description: The current or last known position of the player's hero.

references.description: Reference IDs of the player in external services.

reliableGold.description: Current amount of the player's reliable gold.

respawnTimeRemaining.description: Seconds until the killed hero respawns at the fountain or resurrects in place, if item like Aegis of the Immortal was used.

roshanKills.description: Number of times the player killed Roshan.

runesPickedUp.description: Total number of runes the player picked up.

strength.description: The player's hero current strength value.

towerKills.description: Number of towers the player destroyed during the game.

unreliableGold.description: Current amount of the player's unreliable gold.

visibleByEnemy.description: Indicates whether the player's hero is currently visible by enemies.

visionDaytime.description: The player's hero vision rate during the daytime phase.

visionNighttime.description: The player's hero vision rate during the nighttime phase.

references.description: Reference IDs of the team in external services.

reliableGold.description: Total amount of reliable gold of all team members.

roshanKills.description: Number of times the team members killed Roshan during the game.

shrineKills.description: Number of shrines the team members destroyed during the game.

towerKills.description: Number of towers the team members destroyed during the game.

unreliableGold.description: Total amount of unreliable gold of all team members.

endedAt.description: UTC time and date when the game (map) ended (only for finished games).

gameOver.description: Indicates whether the current game is finished.

gameTime.description: The ingame clock's time in milliseconds.

matchState.description: Current match phase, e.g. HERO_SELECTION, IN_PROGRESS.

paused.description: Indicates whether the match is currently paused.

seriesCurrent.description: Current map number in the match series.

seriesType.description: Type of the match series, e.g. BEST_OF.

seriesStatus.description: Information about current match series status.

winningTeamUrn.description: Reference URN of the winning team, if available.

title: SNAPSHOT/MATCH/UPDATE
description: This message is sent periodically (at most once per second). Match update snapshots are potentially rate-limited to 1 every 5 seconds, depending on the contract.
